meanings.sent1: She preferred to focus on practical matters rather than unspiritual beliefs.
meanings.sent2: The unspiritual man never set foot in a place of worship.
meanings.sent3: The unspiritual cat refused to meditate with the rest of the animals.
meanings.sent4: His unspiritual approach to life left him feeling empty and disconnected.
meanings.sent5: The unspiritual landscape was devoid of any signs of divine presence.

meanings.sent1: The unspiritual atmosphere in the room made her uncomfortable.
meanings.sent2: His unspiritual behavior showed a lack of empathy towards others.
meanings.sent3: The unspiritual plant refused to grow until it was blessed by a monk.
meanings.sent4: Her unspiritual thoughts weighed heavily on her conscience.
meanings.sent5: The unspiritual aura around him was palpable to those sensitive to energy.
